title: CDN Outage Affecting Video Streaming
description: Multiple users report widespread video playback failures. The agent must diagnose the issue, suspecting a CDN problem.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the high volume of user complaints about playback errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a spike in playback error reports.

tasks.description: Check the status dashboards of all primary CDN providers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that a major CDN provider is reporting a partial outage in North America.

tasks.description: Execute a command to reroute all North American traffic to the secondary CDN provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the CDN traffic management configuration.
